jobDescription: At HouseCanary, were using data and analytics to predict the future of US residential real estate. Our goal is to help people make better decisions by offering innovative and unparalleled insights. HouseCanarys platform accurately forecasts values 36 months into the future for four million residential blocks and more than 100 million properties.We're seeking a passionate Data Analyst to help continue building the most powerful dataset in real estate.What you'll do: Apply expertise in quantitative and business analysis to reach actionable insights and drive decision makingCollaborate with engineering, product, sales, and data science teams to identify needs and solve problemsEnsure the quality of all data flowing into and out of our systemsHelp build the best real estate data and analytics offerings on the marketWhat you have:4+ years experience in a data analysis roleAdvanced level SQL knowledgeWorking knowledge of PythonExposure to large datasetsInvolvement with production data ingestion and management systemsExcellent communication skillsCollaborative and proactive personalityBonus points for:Real estate marketsPandas, NumPy, scikit-learnGISHouseCanary is the authoritative source for accurate, uniform information, analyzed and visualized real-time to make better, faster decisions.HouseCanary - one platform, infinite insights.
